  • Namespace JobCheckerUtils

Namespace JobCheckerUtils

Utility functions supporting job checking operations.

Contents

  • Detailed Description

  • Functions

Detailed Description

The Namespace JobCheckerUtils namespace provides a collection of utility functions that support job checking operations including file system operations, string processing for log file parsing, and directory name generation.

Functions

  • Function JobCheckerUtils::file_exists

  • Function JobCheckerUtils::get_file_extension

  • Function JobCheckerUtils::is_valid_log_file
